hero.subtitle: Nationality Process Tracking Services
hero.paragraph: PortugalTracker tracks your nationality proccesses and sends email updates automatically when your applications status is updated or being routed to another conservatoria

header.title: Workflow that just works
header.paragraph: We came up with a successful and accurate tracking method, we call it 'The PortugalTracker Workflow'

feature_1.title: Completely Automatic
feature_1.paragraph: You no longer need to visit the nationality tracking site frequently to check the status of your process, the PortugalTracker system will do it for you, and will send you an email once anything on your process changes.

feature_2.title: Status Updates
feature_2.paragraph: PortugalTracker will send an email to your email address as soon as the status of one of the files at your portfolio changes

feature_3.title: Routing Updates
feature_3.paragraph: When on of the files is being routed to another conservatoria before the final registration phase, you will receive an alert from PortugalTracker about the route event of the file to the designated conservatoria

feature_4.title: Manage Multiple Proccesses
feature_4.paragraph: You can manage a number of proccesses through the PortugalTracker system. Whether if it's your clients, your family members or your friends, you'll get all the alerts in one place and you'll see the status at our unified dashboard
